item.description:
Spring is in the air & what better time to celebrate Mother Nature?! We hope everyone is excited to join us again this month for a FUN time socializing & exercising our favorite furry friends. This Meetup will be held Sunday April 21st from 11:00am-1:00pm. We don't know yet if we'll have rain or shine but our lucky pups will have a chance to splash in our whirl pool, explore & excavate the sand box, and play with stuffed animals! Hope to see you all there!

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Celebrate Earth Day!
